answers.answer: Congrats!!  I hope I pass mine! I take it on the 27th of this month I'll be 27 weeks when I take it :)
Hopefully you do! Keep us updated!

Yay for you :)I failed :/ I take the 3 hour test tomorrow o thought for sure I would pass i fasted the night before didn't eat past 9pm and had my apt at 10am... so wish me luck! I pray I pass the next one im worried!
Awesome!  I hope when it's my turn I pass!

question: I passed my gestational diabetes test and I am super happy! I was really scared since it runs in my family and my mom had it when she was pregnant...just wanted to share.the good news!
title: I passed!
